TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Croatia, title = Croatia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croatia} }

S.FORM: Croatia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 45 10 N, 15 30 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 56,594 sq km (maki' tay 127ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 55,974 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 620 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 4,313,707. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 23.70% , lhlahuy hya' ga 34.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 41.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Zagreb. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 8 na tay mawpuw byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Zoran Milanović, aring ryax 18 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 2020 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Croatia hya' ga cyox maki' tay 45 10 N, 15 30 E na Oco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 56,594 sq km (maki' tay 127ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 55,974 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 620 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 4,313,707. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 23.70% , lhlahoy hya' ga 34.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 41.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Zagreb. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 8 na tay mawpow byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Zoran Milanović, aring ryax 18 sqo byacing tay 2 sa kawas 2020 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
